description:
This course covers some extremely powerful yet easy to use techniques that can significantly impact the time you spend on your email.

This course can be completed in about 1 hour of straight viewing or more time if you want to try out the examples as you go

Key Learning Outcomes

  • Organizing your Inbox quickly
  • Making important mail stand out so you don't miss it
  • Add information to quickly categorize overdue and old email
  • Isolate and work on email based on certain rules
  • Get mail out faster by reusing resources
  • Understand some handy keyboard shortcuts

Materials

This course contains a series of video lectures with associated downloadable PDF documents that outline key steps used in the videos
title: Microsoft Outlook - Powerful Tips, Tricks and Hacks
